source:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_00Amh Garanjy is looking for someone to be her little helper this Starlight season.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_00※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂のアム・ガランジは、星芒祭の準備をしているようだ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_01<tab>The celebrant Amh Garanjy wishes you a happy Starlight amidst a cheerful scene of families rejoicing amidst delightful decorations. There is, however, one child who is not feeling particularly festive: a boy by the name of Nalipponcque, who finds himself alone this eve despite a promise from his father─a bowman of the Gods' Quiver─that they would celebrate the holiday together. After the boy dejectedly wanders away, the celebrant muses that perhaps there is a way to return the smile to his face. To that end, she would have you visit one Piers at Quiver's Hold, that you might inquire as to the whereabouts of his colleague, the boy's father.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_01※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

アム・ガランジから、ナリポンクの父親が星芒祭の音楽会に関係しているかもしれない、と相談を受けた。グリダニアの神勇隊司令砦にいる「ピアス」に話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive at Quiver's Hold and explain the situation to Bowman Piers, who relates to you the circumstances by which his fellow quivermen have been recruited to perform in this year's Starlight concert. He explains that Lartonphe, in particular, is an accomplished vocalist who will be one of the stars of the show. The bowman surmises that his colleague has been sneaking off in secret from his son to rehearse for his performance, and encourages you to seek him out and share with him his son's concerns. At Piers's suggestion, you decide to make for Bentbranch Meadows, where the crooning quiverman means to reunite with his loyal chocobo.
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_02<tab>ピアスによれば、ラルトンフは静養中のチョコボを引き取りに、中央森林に向かったようだ。ベントブランチ牧場にいる「エイルガル」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_03<tab>You arrive at Bentbranch Meadows, where Eylgar the stablehand informs you that Lartonphe departed just a few bells ago. He also mentions that he suggested that the quiverman take his chocobo companion for a walk by the gentle waters of the Jadeite Flood, in hopes of calming the bird's troubled heart. You resolve to venture that way yourself, and survey the surroundings to see if you cannot spot your quarry.
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_03<tab>エイルガルと話した。どうやらラルトンフとは行き違いになってしまったようだ。翡翠湖の付近の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAEDB01 /var>」で見渡そう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_04<tab>At the Jadeite Flood, you are greeted by the sound of singing and chirping in the distance. Following your ear, you come upon Lartonphe and his feathered friend, who are practicing their singing on the shores of the Flood. As the quiverman tells it, the bird was not suffering from an ailment as he feared, but simply was stimulated by his voice, and anxious to join him in song and dance. He laments his own failures in causing his son grief during Starlight season, and resolves to make amends somehow. Man and chocobo then depart to prepare for the performance, but not before Lartonphe beseeches you to return to Amh Garanjy, and ask the celebrant to see to it that his son attends the concert.
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_04<tab>ラルトンフは、音楽会の練習が原因で、息子との時間が取れなかったようだ。ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂にいる「アム・ガランジ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_05<tab>You return to Amh Garanjy and relate the details of your encounter with Lartonphe. She initially struggles to come up with a way to convince Nalipponcque to attend the festivities, until you volunteer the story of a certain singing and dancing chocobo. Convinced that nothing would make for a better Starlight gift to the boy than seeing his favorite bird take the stage with his father, the celebrant encourages you to return to Quiver's Hold and earnestly entreat the quiverman, while she sees to it that the boy does not wander off before the main event.
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_05<tab>アム・ガランジと話した。ナリポンクを喜ばせるためには、音楽会にチョコボも出演させるのが良さそうだ。神勇隊司令砦にいる「ラルトンフ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_06<tab>You arrive at Quiver's Hold to find the ever-serious Lartonphe in the throes of a dilemma most dire. Though he wants nothing more than to give his boy a joyous memory for Starlight, he fears that by his deception he has already alienated the poor child beyond repair. Just when the poor man seems to have lost all hope, the two of you are joined by a most illustrious trio: Miah Molkot of the White Rams, Guildmaster Luciane, and Bowlord Lewin himself. They remind the querulous quiverman of his sworn duty to keep the Twelveswood at peace, and gently point out that going forward with his Starlight performance as promised is a vital part of this. The three illustrious archers offer to cooperate in whatever way they can, after which you provide the final spark of motivation he needs with your inspired proposal that he bring his chocobo companion on stage─a suggestion to which both man and bird eagerly agree. The matter settled to everyone's satisfaction, you set off for Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre to report the triumphant news to Amh Garanjy.
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_06<tab>ラルトンフと話した。音楽会にチョコボも出演できることになった上、冒険者も指揮者として参加することになった。ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂にいる「アム・ガランジ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_07<tab>You return to town and speak with Amh Garanjy, who is delighted to hear that your efforts on her behalf have been a resounding success. Assuring you that all the preparations to begin the Starlight concert have been completed, she invites you to speak with her again whenever you are ready to raise the curtain on what is certain to be a performance to remember.
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SEQ_07<tab>アム・ガランジと話した。音楽会の準備は完了しているので、アム・ガランジから注意事項の説明を受けよう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_000<tab>Well, what have we here? An adventurer, I presume? Why, it's a Starlight miracle─you simply could not have arrived at a better time! Oh, but where are my manners? My name is Amh Garanjy, and I have the pleasure of serving as celebrant for this year's festivities.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_000あら、あなたはもしや、冒険者の方では？
初めまして、わたくしは星芒祭の実行委員長をしております、
アム・ガランジと申します。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_001<tab>Well, what have we here? If it isn't my favorite adventurer! Why, it's a Starlight miracle─you simply could not have arrived at a better time! As you may recall from our past meeting, I am Amh Garanjy, and I have the pleasure of serving as celebrant once again for this year's festivities.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_001冒険者さん！
ご無沙汰しております。
以前にお世話になった、星芒祭実行委員長のアムです。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_002<tab>As you can see, the celebration is in full swing, and I and my colleagues have once again transformed ourselves into the saint's little helpers to dole out gifts galore to the children of our fair realm.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_002現在、わたくしたちは催しの一環として、
星神の伝承に語られる「聖人の従者」に扮して、
子どもたちに贈り物を配っているところなんです。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_003<tab>Needless to say, there is more to Starlight season than presents and pretty ornaments. This year, we've once again decided to stage a musical performance. We will be ready to raise the curtain in a short while, and would be more than honored to have you in the audience!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_003もちろん、それ以外にも音楽会なども企画していますよ。
準備にもう少しだけ時間がかかってしまいますが、
よかったら冒険者さんも観ていってください！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_004<tab>It is our fervent wish that the gift of song, too, serves to warm the hearts and brighten the faces of each and every young boy and girl in town.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_004音楽会を通じて、ひとりでも多くの子どもが、
笑顔になってくれれば良いのですが……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_FESGIRL_000_005<tab>Father! Oh Father, look! One of the saint's little helpers brought me a present!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_FESGIRL_000_005ねぇお父さん。
わたし聖人の従者様からプレゼントをもらっちゃった！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_FESGIRLSDAD_000_006<tab>Oho! Now, isn't that a splendid thing! And do you know what else? Mother and I have prepared a great feast for the family tonight! Let us head home as soon as the concert is over.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_FESGIRLSDAD_000_006そりゃあ良かったなぁ！
今夜は御馳走も用意してあるぞ。
音楽会を観たら、家に帰って一緒に食べよう！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_FESGIRL_000_007<tab>Will there be eel pie? You know I love an eel pie!
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_FESGIRL_000_007<tab>うん！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_FESBOY_000_008<tab>Look! The show is about to begin!
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_FESBOY_000_008<tab>お父さん、もうすぐ音楽会が始まるって！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_FESBOYSDAD_000_009<tab>That it is, son. Word is that it's going to be even grander than last year's performance.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_FESBOYSDAD_000_009ああ、前回のはとても評判が良かったらしいな。
父さん、仕事で来られなかったからなぁ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_FESBOY_000_010<tab>And because you don't have to work at the markets this year, we can see it together! It's a Starlight miracle!
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_FESBOY_000_010<tab>今度は一緒に観られるね、楽しみだなぁ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_011<tab>Happy Starlight to you, child. Might I ask your name?
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_011<tab>ねぇ、キミ……お名前は？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_NALIPPONCQUE_000_012<tab>Huh? I...I'm Nalipponcque. What's it to you?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_NALIPPONCQUE_000_012えっ？
ぼく、ナリポンク、ですけど……

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_013<tab>Why, what a lovely name! You can call me Amh. Pray tell, why the long face? Was your present not what you hoped it would be?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_013ナリポンク君……素敵なお名前ね！
でも、ちょっぴり、沈んだ顔をしていたみたいだけど……
ひょっとして……プレゼント、欲しいものじゃなかった？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_NALIPPONCQUE_000_014<tab>N-No, that's not it at all. I love the stuffed chocobo the little helper gave me. T-Truly...I thank you for your kindness.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_NALIPPONCQUE_000_014そ、そんなことないよ！
チョコボのこと大好きだから、ぬいぐるみ欲しかったんだ！
だから従者様、本当にありがとう！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_NALIPPONCQUE_000_015<tab>It's just that...you see, I really wish Father could be here.
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_NALIPPONCQUE_000_015<tab>ただ……お父さんと一緒に来たかったなって。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_016<tab>...I see. Do tell me more.
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_016<tab>お父さん、どうかしたの？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_NALIPPONCQUE_000_017<tab>Father serves in the Gods' Quiver. His name is Lartonphe. Perhaps you know of him?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_NALIPPONCQUE_000_017ぼくのお父さん……ラルトンフっていうんだけど、
神勇隊の隊士をやってるんだ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_NALIPPONCQUE_000_018<tab>Anyhow, he promised me a fortnight ago that this year─for certain!─we'd go to the festivities together. But then he was assigned to emergency duty. Ever since then, he scarcely comes home at night.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_NALIPPONCQUE_000_018それでね、星芒祭を一緒に見て回ろうって約束してたのに……
急に警備の人手が足りなくなったとか言って、
最近はろくに家にも帰ってきてないんだ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_NALIPPONCQUE_000_019<tab>I know that these are dangerous times, and Father's task is an important one. But is it too much to ask that he could at least celebrate Starlight with his family?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_NALIPPONCQUE_000_019大変なお仕事なのはわかるけど、せっかくのお祭なんだから、
家族が一緒にいられる時間があればいいのに……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_020<tab>With the Gods' Quiver, you say? It couldn't be...
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_020<tab>お父さんが神勇隊……それって、まさか……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_021<tab>Say, Nalipponcque... I have an idea. The concert will begin shortly. Why don't we watch it together?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_021ねぇ、ナリポンク君。
もう少ししたら、聖歌隊の音楽会も始まるから、
良かったらそっちも楽しんでいってね！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_NALIPPONCQUE_000_022<tab>Thank you, but I'd rather not. It wouldn't be any fun without Father, and besides...I don't care much for song and dance, anyway. Good evening to you.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_NALIPPONCQUE_000_022でも、そんなのひとりで観たって楽しくないよ。
あんまり歌とか興味ないし……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_023<tab>The poor child... As if it weren't hard enough being alone during Starlight season, it must be even more painful to be surrounded by happy families rejoicing together. If only there were something we could do to return the smile to his face.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_023お祭を家族一緒に過ごせないだなんて、
まわりが盛り上がっている分、余計に辛いですよね……。
なんとかして、あの子を笑顔にできたら良いのですけれど。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_024<tab>...To tell the truth, I just had an idea. The boy said that his father is a bowman of the Gods' Quiver, did he not?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_024実は、ひとつ気になったことがありまして。
あの子のお父さん、神勇隊の隊士だって言ってましたよね？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_025<tab>As a matter of fact, a contingent from the Quiver has been enlisted to perform in our concert. It may merely be a coincidence, but I cannot help but wonder if <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> is the true reason Lartonphe is occupied of late.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_025実は、今回の音楽会には、
神勇隊が参加することになっているんです。
もしかすると、ラルトンフさんが忙しい理由も……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_026<tab>And so I ask of you, adventurer: would you be so kind as to lend your talents to help me chase the shadows from a boy's troubled heart?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_026冒険者さん、申し訳ありませんが、
ナリポンク君を笑顔にするためにも、ご協力いただけませんか？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_027<tab>Thank you, my friend! The spirit of the saint truly does live on within you! A bowman by the name of Piers has been our main contact at Quiver's Hold. If there is anyone who could shed some light on the matter, it would be him.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_027ありがとうございます！
音楽会に関しては「ピアス」さんが窓口になってますから、
「神勇隊司令砦」まで行って、彼に話を聞いてみてください！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_028<tab>Have you spoken with Piers at Quiver's Hold? I beg of you, friend, pray help us track down Lartonphe, that we might put a smile on poor young Nalipponcque's face!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_028冒険者さん、どうかお願いです。
「神勇隊司令砦」の「ピアス」さんに会ってみてください。
音楽会について、彼からお話を聞けるはずです。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_030<tab>I'm Piers, all right. Is there something you need?
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_030<tab>む？　私になんの用だ？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_031<tab>Lartonphe's boy is looking for him, you say? That's odd. It's true that our bowmen have had their hands full ensuring the city was safe and secure for Starlight season, but it's hardly so onerous a task as to keep them away from seeing their families entirely.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_031隊士のラルトンフの勤務状況？
いくら星芒祭期間で警備の手が要るとはいえ、
家族と過ごす時間が取れぬほど忙しいとは思えないが……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_032<tab>That is, of course, unless...yes, that must be it.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_032……いや、待てよ？
ひょっとして、アレが原因か？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_033<tab>Allow me to explain. As you may know, the Starlight Celebration can trace its origins back to ancient Ishgard. Indeed, many of the choral tunes sung during the celebration to this day were passed down to us by their Temple Knights.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_033順を追って説明しよう。
星芒祭というのは、もともとイシュガルドの近衛兵たちの、
善行に由来する祝祭でね……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_034<tab>To honor the tradition, we of the Gods' Quiver decided to join together with the Archers' Guild to take part in this year's Starlight concert, that we might lift the hearts of the children with song, just as our Ishgardian counterparts have done throughout the ages.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_034その逸話にあやかって、我々も弓術士ギルドと協力し、
音楽会に出て、子どもたちに歌を贈ろうという話になったのだ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_035<tab>Now that you mention it, Lartonphe is one of those who will be taking to the stage for the main performance. No doubt he intends to keep this a secret until the curtain rises.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_035実は、件のラルトンフも舞台に上がるメンバーなのだよ。
おっと、このことは本番まで子どもたちには内密にな？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_036<tab>His mellifluous voice truly is a marvel to behold. Why, some would say he's the most talented tenor in all of Gridania.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_036歌の名手でもある彼は、
音楽会に並々ならぬ意気込みでいたからな。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_037<tab>...And his devotion to his craft is second to none. I would not be surprised if he gave the child some excuse about guard duty in order to sneak off and spend extra time rehearsing.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_037おそらく、自分の息子には警備で忙しいと言っておいて、
陰で歌の練習でもしているのではないだろうか。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_038<tab>The performance is almost nigh, yes? If you and your colleagues are concerned, I suggest you seek Lartonphe out and inform him of his boy's plight.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_038そうだな……そろそろ本番も近い。
もし心配なら、彼を訪ねて直接、息子の様子を伝えてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_039<tab>Last I heard, he was headed to Bentbranch Meadows to reunite with his loyal chocobo, who was taken there for treatment after behaving erratically of late.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_039ラルトンフは、中央森林にいるはずだ。
最近、調子を崩して療養させていたチョコボを引き取りに、
「ベントブランチ牧場」に向かったのだよ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_040<tab>On the off chance that he's already moved on, just speak with Eylgar at the stables. He's like as not to know where Lartonphe went next.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_040行き違いになるかもしれん。
もしも、牧場に彼の姿がない場合は、
衛士の「エイルガル」に話を聞くといいだろう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_045<tab>Lartonphe is a passionate man in all that he does, but if there's two things he's more devoted to than anything, it's music and his feathered friend.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_045ラルトンフは中央森林の「ベントブランチ牧場」に向かった。
もし行き違いになってしまったら、「エイルガル」に聞けば、
居場所がわかるはずだ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_EYLGAR_000_050<tab>A quiverman by the name of Lartonphe, you say? Indeed, he left a few bells ago with his feathered friend in tow. If he hasn't returned to his post yet, I'd imagine they must have stopped off somewhere along the way.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_EYLGAR_000_050神勇隊のラルトンフ殿を探しているのか？
少し前にチョコボを引き取って、もう帰られたぞ。
まだ都市に戻ってないとなると、寄り道をしているのだろう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_EYLGAR_000_051<tab>The poor bird... She's not suffering from any physical ailment as far as I could see, and yet she's constantly crying out, champing at the bit, and stomping her feet.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_EYLGAR_000_051あのチョコボ、どうにも様子がおかしくてな。
怪我や病でもないのに、クエクエと鳴きながら、
足を踏み鳴らし、大騒ぎを続けていたんだ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_EYLGAR_000_052<tab>I suggested to Lartonphe that perhaps the strain of recent battles is still weighing on her mind─happens to the birds just as it happens to us, you know─and that a leisurely walk through the woods might do them both some good.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_EYLGAR_000_052そこで、ストレスが原因かも知れないと伝え、
帰りがけに気晴らしの散歩でもさせてみてはと提案したのさ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_EYLGAR_000_053<tab>Come to think of it, I remember him saying something about swinging by the Jadeite Flood on the way home. Mayhap you'd be able to find him there?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_EYLGAR_000_053ここからグリダニアまでの途上だと……そうだな。
川沿いに北に向かった、翡翠湖のあたりだろうか。
橋の上から見渡してみるといい。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_EYLGAR_000_055<tab>I can only hope that the soothing sights and sounds of the Jadeite Flood have helped to put that poor bird's heart at ease...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_EYLGAR_000_055ここからグリダニアまでの途上だと……そうだな。
川沿いに北に向かった、翡翠湖のあたりだろうか。
橋の上から見渡してみるといい。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>You look out far and wide, but find no sign of Lartonphe or his bird. Just as you are about to abandon hope, you make out a voice singing in the distance...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_SYSTEM_000_060近くにラルトンフの姿は見えないが、
どこからか歌声が聞こえてくる……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_070<tab>Ahem! Faaaaaa～lalalala!♪
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_070<tab>ラ～ララ～♪

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_071<tab>Kweh! Kweh!♪
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_071<tab>クエ～♪

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_072<tab>Troooooo～lolololo!♪
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_072<tab>ララル～ララ～♪

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_073<tab>Kweh, kweh, kweh!♪
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_073<tab>クエックエ～♪

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_074<tab>Hoho! Impeccable rhythm, my friend! I knew from the day we met that you were a chocobo after my own heart!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_074フフッ、いいリズムだ。
やはりお前には音楽の才能があるようだな！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_075<tab>Kweh!♪
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_075<tab>クエ～ッ♪

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_076<tab>Oho, it seems we have a guest. And who might you be?
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_076<tab>おや、あなたは……？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_077<tab>...Oh dear. It's true that I've been spending much of my time with my musical pursuits of late, but never did I think my boy would take it so hard...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_077そうですか……ナリポンクがそんなことを……。
お察しのとおり、ここ最近は音楽会の練習をしておりまして、
息子とはあまり顔を合わせていなかったのです。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_078<tab>I truly have made a mess of things, haven't I? And at the very time of the year when the smiles of the children are to take priority above all else...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_078「子どもを笑顔にするため」と思って頑張っていましたが、
それは、大人の勝手な言い分……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_100_078<tab>Why, I could brighten the hearts of a hundred─nay, a thousand─children with my song, and it would mean not a thing if my dear Nali walked away with a frown!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_100_078星芒祭の催しを成功させるためとはいえ、
息子に寂しい想いをさせてはいけませんね……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_079<tab>Kweh...
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_079<tab>クエ～……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_080<tab>A fine bird, is she not? Aye, she is my most loyal and treasured companion. This is why I was all the more troubled when she started to behave strangely of late.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_080ああ、気になりますか？
コイツをグリダニアに連れ帰る途中、
遠回りをして、散歩させていたんですがね……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_081<tab>And so, at the stablehand's suggestion, I took her on a stroll by the waters. Absent-mindedly, I began to hum a tune, when─wouldn't you know it─she started picking up her feet and prancing in time.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_081練習がてらに鞍上で歌を口ずさんだところ、
なんとリズムに合わせて、踊りだしたんです！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_082<tab>That's when it came to me─she wasn't ill, nor troubled of heart or mind. Far from it─she shares my profound passion for music, and merely wanted to join me in song and dance all this time! Isn't that right, my friend?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_082それでやっと謎が解けました。
どうやらコイツは、暴れたかったわけじゃない。
音楽会を楽しみにしてただけだったんですよ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_083<tab>Kweh kweh!♪
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_083<tab>クエッ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_084<tab>Typically, Quiver's Hold is a stern and somber place, but as the Starlight Celebration drew nearer and nearer, our halls were filled with music and song. Doubtless she's just been beside herself with a desire to partake in the festivities along with her master.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_084きっと、音楽会に出演するために、
私たちが練習するのを見て、気になっていたんでしょう。
星芒祭ムードになり始めたものだから、ソワソワしてたんだ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_Q2_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_A2_000_001<tab>Truly a friend for all seasons!
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_A2_000_001<tab>お祭はワクワクする！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_A2_000_002<tab>Are you quite sure about that?
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_A2_000_002<tab>ただの偶然では……？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_085<tab>In any event, never in my wildest dreams did I expect my companion to respond so enthusiastically to my humble renditions of traditional Starlight carols.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_085それにしても、まさかチョコボが、
私の歌声で喜んでくれるとは。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_086<tab>...Would that Nali felt the same way. Sadly, the boy is of an age where he's more interested in animals than in song and verse. I can only hope that seeing his father perform on the grand stage will change that...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_086息子も、私の歌を聴いて喜んでくれると良いのですが……。
あの子はまだ、詩や歌よりもチョコボが好きな年頃で。
私が歌が得意だということも知らないはず……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_100_086<tab>Oh, but the elementals take me! How soon I forget! You said my boy has already wandered away from the square, did you not!?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_100_086……しまった！
肝心なことを見落としていた！
息子が音楽会を観に来ない可能性もあるのか……！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_110_086<tab>Which means that he will miss my performance! He will cry into his pillow tonight, thinking that his miserable father abandoned him, and on Starlight, no less!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_110_086そうなったら、息子は寂しい想いをしたまま、
星芒祭を終えることに……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_087<tab>Kweh!♪
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_087<tab>クエ～ッ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_088<tab>Don't look so glum, you say? I suppose you're right. How can I hope to put a smile on my boy's face if I, myself, panic and frown?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_088ええっ、暗い顔をするなって？
……ハハ、確かにお前の言う通りだ。
子どもたちを笑顔にする前に、私が笑顔にならなくてはね。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_089<tab>...But I've rambled on enough already. The concert will be getting started at any moment, and my colleagues will be wondering what is keeping me. Might I ask one small favor of you before I go?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_089あぁ、そろそろ街に戻らねばならない時間だ！
申し訳ないのですが、ひとつ頼まれていただけないでしょうか。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_090<tab>Pray explain the situation to the Starlight celebrant, and ask her to seek out my boy and see to it that he attends the performance. I would surprise him with a Starlight memory that will fill his heart with joy.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_090息子のことを心配してくださった実行委員の方に、
事情をお伝えして、息子を音楽会に誘っていただきたいのです。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_091<tab>Thank you, my friend. You are truly a Starlight miracle in the flesh. And with that, my companion and I should be returning to the Hold. We shall see you at the concert─I trust you will be in attendance?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_091ありがとうございます！
それでは私は隊舎に戻ります。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_095<tab>You were able to find Lartonphe, I trust? He returned not long ago. And it's a good thing, too! We were starting to worry we might have to delay the performance!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_PIERS_000_095ラルトンフには会えたのか？
そろそろ本番が始まる時間だから、我々も緊張してきたよ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_100<tab>Well, if it isn't my favorite little helper! How fare you? Were you able to track down dear Nalipponcque's father?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_100あ、冒険者さん！
ナリポンク君のお父さんについて、何かわかりましたか？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_101<tab>...I see. Indeed, I suspected that may well have been the truth of the matter. So Lartonphe's passion for his musical pursuits is what has kept him away from his family...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_101やっぱり、音楽会が原因だったんですね。
子どもたちのための合唱の練習が、
家族の時間を奪うことになっていたなんて……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_102<tab>I agree that a surprise appearance from his dear father would go a long way to raise the boy's spirits. Still, how are we to convince him to attend the concert? Yes, that is the rub...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_102これまで内緒にしていた分、お父さんのステージに驚いて、
ナリポンク君が喜んでくれたら良いのですが……。
彼、音楽会に興味がなさそうでしたよね？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_A1_000_001<tab>He didn't seem interested in music...
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_A1_000_001<tab>歌には興味がなさそうだった

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_A1_000_002<tab>He did like his present...
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_A1_000_002<tab>歌よりも、チョコボに夢中のはず！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_103<tab>Indeed, he did not. There must be <var 1A 02 /var>something<var 1A 01 /var> the boy fancies, but what could it be...?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_103冒険者さんもそう思います？
ナリポンク君が興味ありそうなものといえば……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_104<tab>Indeed, he sounded most pleased with his stuffed chocobo. If only there was a procession of chocobos or the like, perhaps we could convince him to attend, but I fear we have planned nothing of the sort...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_104ええ、チョコボのぬいぐるみを喜んでくれてましたね。
音楽会じゃなくて、チョコボの行進とかだったら、
ナリポンク君も喜んでくれたでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_105<tab>What's this you say? Lartonphe's companion is a chocobo that dances and sings!? How positively bizarre...er, delightful, that is! Positively delightful!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_105お父さんの歌に合わせて踊るチョコボがいるですって？
それは素敵ですね！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_106<tab>If this remarkable bird were to take the stage with his dear father, no doubt Nalipponcque would be thrilled beyond belief! Why, he might even find himself enjoying song and dance as never he has before!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_106大好きなお父さんとチョコボが一緒にステージに立ったら、
きっとナリポンク君も笑顔になるに違いありません。
それなら音楽会も楽しんでもらえるでしょうね！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_107<tab>Yes, I believe I know just what we have to do. Leave the boy to me. In the meantime, will you seek out Lartonphe once more and convince him to make his feathered friend a part of his performance? Tell him it's for his son's sake.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_107わたくしはナリポンク君に声をかけておきますから、
冒険者さんはお父さんに、チョコボもステージに上がれないか
相談してみていただけませんか？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_110<tab>If Lartonphe and the chocobo were to take to the stage together, I do believe it would be the boy's Starlight wish come true.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_110わたくしはナリポンク君に声をかけておきますから、
冒険者さんはお父さんに、チョコボもステージに上がれないか
相談してみていただけませんか？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_100_120<tab>Oh, for woe! Whatever am I to do?
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_100_120<tab>あぁ、不安だ……！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_120<tab>Forgive me, friend. I fear I find myself in the throes of desperation and despair. I had a mind to take the stage as planned, but I simply haven't the heart to do.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_120ああ、すみません。
もう本番の時間ですよね。
息子のことが気がかりで、少し神経質になってしまって……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_121<tab>What a fool I was! I meant to surprise the boy with a performance for the ages, but what will he think when he finds out that his father is a liar and a coward who was fa-la-la'ing when he was supposed to be protecting the people of Gridania from harm? Why, he'll never trust me again...!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_121街を守る大事な仕事だからといって家を空けておきながら、
呑気に歌なんてうたってる父親の姿を見たら、
あの子はどう思うでしょうか。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_122<tab>(-???-)What is this whinging and wallowing in self-pity!? And you call yourself a quiverman!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_122(-？？？？-)何を弱気になっている！
それでも栄えある神勇隊の一員か？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_123<tab>B-Bowlord Lewin!? Wh-What brings you to this place...?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_123リュウィン隊長！
いえ、これは、その……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_124<tab>I will ask the questions here, Lartonphe. Tell me: what is your sworn duty as a bowman of the Gods' Quiver?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_124神勇隊の使命とはなんだ？
言ってみろ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_125<tab>Wh-Why...of course it is to honor our pact with the elementals, to protect the Twelveswood from outside threats, and to see that not a single resident of fair Gridania comes to harm!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_125そ、それはもちろん、精霊の意思に従い森を外敵から守り、
市民の安全を確保することであります！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_126<tab>Well, yes...I suppose that is all true. But to put it in more simple terms, one might say it is to preserve peace in the forest, and see that our citizens can live happy and contented lives.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_126フッ、頭が固いな。
……こうは考えられんか？
「森の平穏を護り、市民の生活に笑顔をもたらすことだ」とな。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_127<tab>F-Forgive me, Bowlord. I do not quite understand what you are getting at...?
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_127<tab>それは、いったいどういう……？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_MIAHMOLKOT_000_128<tab>In other words, bringing smiles to the faces of Gridania's children is an important part of your duty to keep the peace in the Twelveswood! Do you understand meow─er, now?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_MIAHMOLKOT_000_128つまり！
子どもを笑顔にすることも、街の平和を守ることニャの……
オホン……街の平和を守ることなのだ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_MIAHMOLKOT_000_129<tab>We must honor the wishes of our forebears and pass them down to those who will follow in our footsteps. For it is only in doing so that we can see that the forest remains hale and hearty for ages to come.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_MIAHMOLKOT_000_129受け継がれた想いを、次の世代へとつニャぐ……
オホン……次の世代へと繋ぐことが大事！
森の未来は、私たちの心ひとつにかかっているのニャ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LUCIANE_000_130<tab>...Interesting. Looking at you, I am reminded of my own father, once Bowlord of the Quiver in his own right.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LUCIANE_000_130あなたを見ていると、
神勇隊の師団長だった私の父を思い出します。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LUCIANE_000_131<tab>He was a passionate man─devoted above all to his duties─and I admired him more than anyone in the world. Though I did not follow directly in his footsteps, I have chosen to honor his memory in my own way─by training the brave souls who will keep our fair wood at peace.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LUCIANE_000_131私も父が職務に命をかける姿を見て、憧れを抱きました。
結局、私は父とは違う道を選びましたが、
それも平和を守る道はひとつではないと学んだからこそです。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_132<tab>I-Instructor Molkot...and Guildmaster Luciane! Whatever has this humble bowman done to deserve this honor!?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_132白羊師団のミア・モルコット師団長に、
弓術士ギルドのルシアヌ殿まで……！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_133<tab>I have no children of my own, and I would be lying if I said that watching you now, even in your worries, did not evoke in me a sense of envy...and of regret.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_133わしには子がいない……。
それゆえ、子のことで悩むお前を見ると、羨ましくさえ思う。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_134<tab>But even so, there is nothing I would rather see than a smile on the face of you and your boy. After all, it is the season for such things, is it not?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_134そして、そんな親子がともに笑顔であってくれれば、
なお嬉しく思うだろう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_135<tab>And so as Bowlord of the Gods' Quiver, I command you: put your fears aside, take the stage, and serenade young Nalipponcque to your heart's content. My colleagues and I will do all in our power to see that your deeply held wishes reach the boy.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_135こたびの音楽会、お前は息子の笑顔を取り戻すことに努めよ。
我々も全力で支援しよう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_136<tab>Bowlord Lewin... I...I do not deserve this kindness.
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_136<tab>隊長……！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_137<tab>Kweh kweh! Kweh!
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_137<tab>クエッ、クエ～ッ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_138<tab>Ah, but there I go being all glower and gloom again. Thank you, my loyal companion─you are always there for me in my darkest times.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_138ああ、すまん、また暗い顔をしていたか？
お前には励まされてばかりだ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_100_138<tab>And you, friend. You look as if there is something you wish to say. Do you have a proposal, pray tell, which might resolve my plight?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_100_138ところで冒険者さん、
何か提案がありそうな様子ですね？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_139<tab>What if I were to include my feathered friend in my performance? For Nali's sake? Come to think of it, the boy has always been fond of the birds...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_139えっ、このチョコボも一緒に音楽会に！？
確かに、息子はチョコボのぬいぐるみを欲しがるくらい、
大のチョコボ好きですが……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_MIAHMOLKOT_000_140<tab>His dear father and one of his beloved birds taking the stage together? Meow <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> an inspired idea if I've ever heard one!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_MIAHMOLKOT_000_140いいじゃニャいか！
チョコボと一緒に歌う父親ニャんて、
ニャかニャか……オホン。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_MIAHMOLKOT_000_141<tab>Apologies─a slip of the tongue. When I say “meow,” I mean “meow”... Grrr. Not meow─<var 1A 02 /var>meow<var 1A 01 /var>! ...Bah!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_MIAHMOLKOT_000_141なかなかいニャい……ええい、
「な」の発音は苦手ニャのだ……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LUCIANE_000_142<tab>I must say, it sounds like a foolproof plan to me as well. After all, the bird has been trained to serve on the battlefield. Surely a Starlight performance would be well within the realm of its capabilities.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LUCIANE_000_142私も賛成だわ。
それにこの子、神勇隊のチョコボなんでしょう？
だったら、一緒に参加する資格は十分あるはずよ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_143<tab>Then I daresay the matter is settled. I trust you have no objections, Lartonphe?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_143決まりだな。
まさか不服はあるまい？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_144<tab>N-None in the slightest, Bowlord Lewin!
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_144<tab>も、もちろんです！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_145<tab>...That is to say, if <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> do not, my fast, feathered friend. What say you? Will you do this for me and my boy?
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_145<tab>なぁ、私のために、力を貸してくれるか？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_146<tab>Kweh! Kweh kweh kweh!
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_146<tab>クエッ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_147<tab><sniff> Oh, whatever have I done to deserve such a constant companion...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_147そうか……。
こんな不甲斐ない私のために……すまない！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_148<tab>Kweh! Kweh!
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_148<tab>クエ～ッ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_149<tab><sniff> Ah, right you are. Turn that frown upside down, yes?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_149フッ、そうだった。
暗い顔はダメだったな！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_150<tab>And with that, I have but one last humble request to make of you, friend. Would you be so kind as to conduct our forthcoming performance?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_150あの、冒険者殿にひとつ頼みがあるのですが……
我々の合唱の指揮を、引き受けていただけないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_151<tab>While my companion here is eager and willing to ascend to the stage with me, this will be her first such endeavor. Mind you, I, too, cannot lay claim to having sung a duet with a chocobo before.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_151コイツはいくら音楽好きといっても、
合唱用に訓練されたチョコボじゃありません。
そして我々も、チョコボと一緒に歌った経験はありません。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_152<tab>Though she has only known you a short time, it is clear from the look in her eyes. She trusts you as much as anyone...her own master included. Were you to lead the performance, I have no doubt she would happily dance to your every instruction. Isn't that so?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_152見れば、コイツはあなたを気に入ってる様子……
あなたの指揮があれば、しっかりとリズムを合わせて、
踊ってくれると思うのですよ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_154<tab>Kweh! Kweh!
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_CHOCOBO_000_154<tab>クエッ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_155<tab>Just as I thought. So, what say you? Will you join us to make this Starlight a special one for my boy?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_155フフ、コイツもこう言ってくれてますし。
いかがでしょうか？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_Q3_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_A3_000_001<tab>Let us make this a performance for the ages.
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_A3_000_001<tab>やるからには完璧を目指す！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_A3_000_002<tab>Let's just have fun up there, yes?
target: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_A3_000_002<tab>失敗してもいいから、とにかく楽しもう！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_156<tab>Thank you, my friend! You truly are a saint. And with that, we should make for the amphitheatre. The others will want to be started any time now.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LARTONPHE_000_156ありがとう！
それでは、我々はミィ・ケット野外音楽堂に向かいます！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_160<tab>Does it surprise you that I agreed to be a part of the performance? Well, it should not. I have talents beyond bow-bending, after all.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LEWIN_000_160フッ、わしが合唱に参加するのが意外か？
何も神勇隊の使命は森に仇なす者の討滅だけではない。
我々の想いで、子どもたちを笑顔にしてみせようではないか！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LUCIANE_000_161<tab>None other than Bowlord Lewin himself appointed me to my post, and our guild has cooperated with the Quiver ever since its inception. This Starlight performance shall be no exception.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_LUCIANE_000_161弓術士ギルドと神勇隊は浅からぬ間柄……
今回の合唱は、両者の結束を示すいい機会になるでしょう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_MIAHMOLKOT_000_162<tab>I'll thank you not to tell anyone that the fearless leader of the White Rams will be taking the stage this Starlight.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_MIAHMOLKOT_000_162星芒祭の音楽会への参加は極秘任務ニャのだ。
泣く子も黙る私の歌声、楽しみにするといい！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_170<tab>Welcome back, friend! I see your mission was a success: Lartonphe and his charming little─or not-so-little, really─chocobo showed up not moments ago. I'm happy to report that I was also able to convince Nalipponcque to attend the show.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_170ラルトンフさんがチョコボと一緒に来てくれましたよ！
ナリポンク君を誘うこともできましたので、
これでいつでも本番を始められます！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_171<tab>What's that? You'll be conducting the performance, you say? I knew you were a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of many talents, but I didn't expect you to volunteer yourself for this as well!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_171えっ、冒険者さんが合唱の指揮を？
なにからなにまでお世話になってしまって……
本当にありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_172<tab>Still, I thank you, friend. We are ever in your debt. And with that, I do believe we are ready to get this show on the road. Whenever you would like to begin, simply speak the word.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS501_03722_AMHGARANJY_000_172それでは、準備ができましたら声をかけてください。
お待ちしてますね！
